title: Unable to login
body:
never seen this but i cant login in game because of login queue it one of the rioters fault, its ok it happens, but tell me when will i be able to log in

have fun

replies.body:
Awwwww it's not his fault, even Rioters make mistakes sometimes xD!

The login troubles should be cleared up by now, but you can join in on [**this discussion**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/WEK0auGA-unable-to-connect-to-the-login-queue) if you want a little more info on what happened.

OHHHHH DAMN A RIOTER!!!!!!

i know i said its ok :DDD

happens to th ebest of us :))

Heya Uprising,

See this thread here --> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/w1iMZhz6-cant-login-unable-to-connect-to-login-queue 

They are working on a fix!
